Explore Asheville

The second redesign of ExploreAsheville.com, tourism website for the Asheville Convention & Visitors Bureau.
Tools Utilized: HTML5, CSS3, NodeJS, Goatee, Responsive Design 

View this project on GitHub

Knowing the posts would only ever be images, I kept things simple with just an ajax call for the posts.
